name: Work “Hard”
description:
Tired of your new boss and his endless list of meaningless tasks? 

Why not slack off!

Fight your awful boss by doing anything but work

  • Play games during work
  • Quickly swap between work and game screens
  • Look around and listen to footsteps to avoid getting caught
  • Manage your mood to experience different endings

Let the "work" begin!
